name: Am I Dreaming? (DEMO)
description:
THIS GAME IT'S STILL JUST A DEMO!!

"Uhmm, am I dreaming?"

FIXING ERRORS

The game isn't working at all? Maybe you need to install the free RPG Maker XP's RTP! Here is a link for the RTPs and how to install them:

https://www.rpgmakerweb.com/download/additional/run-time-packages

RESUME

Am I Dreaming its a short RPG that tells the story of Carlota, a young 14 years old girl who, in the middle of the night, wakes up only to find a friendly crow named Rodiart who affirms to be her familiar and that she and her family are in danger. To save them, she must immediately become the witch that she was destined to be! Will you be able to help Carlota in this dreamlike night? Or... There will be something else?

FEATURES/FUTURE FEATURES

- An adorable witch as the protagonist!

- A friendly crow as her familiar?

- Cute little monsters and cursed object bosses!

- 100% Original Art, Story and Characters from scratch!

- IT'S FREE!! (But a tip would be apreciated! :D)

- It's in English and European Portuguese (I'm from Portugal, and Carlota too btw!)

- MADE IN PORTUGAL! (I told you that I'm from there, remeber? :D)

- More lenguages/translations to come!! (If interested to help please contact me!)

- I'm planning to do/to pay someone to do origial soundtracks and sounds effects for my game! And maybe the attack art too!

CONTROLS

Move - Arrows

Interact/Confirm - Z

Menu/Cancel - X

Fullscreen - Alt+Enter

CREDITS

Art, Story, Characters, English ver. and European Portuguese ver.: Alexander Amaki (ME!)

Software/Tool, Music, Sounds and Attack/Magic Art: RPG Maker XP (Enterbrain/KADOKAWA)

SPECIAL THANKS

To everyone who supported me while doing this game and to all of you who played it! :D

And also a big thank you for every indie who I admire and inspirated me to seek my dreams of doing my own first game as a indie too!
